title: Jira-Mcp
description: An MCP server that allows Large Language Models (LLMs) to interact with JIRA for executing JQL queries and retrieving issue details.
creator: CamdenClark

JIRA_INSTANCE_URL.description: Base URL of the JIRA instance.

JIRA_USER_EMAIL.description: Email address associated with your Atlassian account.

JIRA_API_KEY.description: API token or Personal Access Token for JIRA authentication.
